settings.heading: Hi, I'm Laura. A passionate web developer with over 20 years of experience in creating stunning, user-friendly online experiences.
Hi, I'm Laura. A passionate web developer with over 20 years of experience in creating stunning, user-friendly online experiences.

settings.caption: My journey began in the early days of the internet, where I developed a passion for web design and development that has only grown stronger over the years.

settings.text:
As a Shopify Partner, I love creating custom, user-friendly e-commerce websites that not only reflect your brand’s identity but also enhance the user experience and drive sales. From custom theme design and site builds to seamless migrations, I pride myself on delivering solutions tailored to each client’s unique needs. I understand that a well-designed website is crucial for attracting and retaining customers, and I’m dedicated to creating solutions that drive results.

In addition to web development, I also specialise in email marketing, with a strong focus on Klaviyo. I work closely with businesses to design targeted email campaigns that resonate with their audience, driving engagement and conversions. Whether it’s setting up automated flows or crafting compelling campaigns, my goal is to help you connect with your audience in meaningful ways.

settings.caption: Whether you’re just starting out or looking to enhance your existing digital presence, I’m here to help you succeed online. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to the opportunity to work together.

settings.text: "We very much see Times 2 as stakeholders in our business as they’ve always gone above and beyond to make sure we get rockstar service and a solution that bottom line makes us money and gives our customers the easiest possible online ordering experience. We’ve just re-platformed our website to Shopify this summer and the numbers don’t lie! Increased traffic, revenue and and customer satisfaction have all shot through the roof. We need have a future proof website delivered on budget, on time with some really complex backend requirements, Times 2 are very much at the heart of our business.”

settings.text: "We very much see Times 2 as stakeholders in our business as they’ve always gone above and beyond to make sure we get rockstar service and a solution that bottom line makes us money and gives our customers the easiest possible online ordering experience. We’ve just re-platformed our website to Shopify this summer and the numbers don’t lie! Increased traffic, revenue and and customer satisfaction have all shot through the roof. "Times 2 have been nothing but amazing from our very first meeting... they have taken my ideas/sketches/dreams and made them a reality! I spent months going back and forth with other avenues to no avail. I knew what I wanted to do but I didn’t know how or if it was even going to be possible. Not only did they create a website that looks fantastic but is super easy to use for both the customer and for myself and my staff. I am not the most technically able so they showed me how to navigate the website with ease whilst always at the other end of the phone should anything need explaining for the second or even third time. I cannot thank them enough, not only do I now have a website to be proud of but I have the increase in revenue to go with it.”
